metadata.name: Resource
title: Gcloud
Logging
Resource
metadata.description:
Resource

Monitored resource that is used by Cloud Logging.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
resource = logging.resource "gae_app",
                            "module_id" => "1",
                            "version_id" => "20150925t173233"

metadata.name: labels
title: Gcloud
Logging
Resource#labels
metadata.description: A set of labels that can be used to describe instances of this monitored resource type.
